paragraph.heading:
Mesopolobus teliformis (Walker, 1834)
New record to China
( Fig. 25 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Platyterma teliforme
Walker, 1834a: 305
, Lectotype ♀ , BMNH ( Examined, B.M. TYPE HYM 5.1828 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Synonym:
Platyterma cincticorne Walker, 1834a: 306
;
Pteromalus placidus Förster, 1841: 11
;
Eutelus brevicornis Thomson, 1878: 77
.

Biology.
M. teliformis
was collected from the follower of
Agropyron repens
(L.)Beauv., the seeds of
Agropyron cristatum
(L.) and
Agropyron junceiforme A. Löve & D. Löve
( Rosen, 1960 ; Graham, 1969 ). Our species from Ningxia was recorded collected from
Tamarix ramosissima Ledeb
, one female from Xingjiang was recorded parasite on armored scale.
Distribution. China ( Inner Mongolia , Beijing , Hebei , Shanxi , Shandong , Shaanxi , Ningxia , Gansu , Xinjiang , Hunan , Sichuan , Fujian , Yunnan , Tibet ); Palearctic Region ( Noyes, 2014 ).
